name: Pixel Basket
description:
A story driven 2D top-down basketball mechanics very similar to TikiTaka Soccer. Designed to show the struggles of college basketball players making it to the NBA, You go against famous NBA Puma sponsored athletes in order to become the best rookie in the NBA.

▅▄▃▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▂▃▄▅

This Project is a school project that allowed us to create a Industry Brief Project in groups of four to convey an endorsed athlete through the use of games!

▅▄▃▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▂▃▄▅

Special thanks to ELAM for giving us the opportunity to create this game!
